Html:
The patterns & practice client team needs your feedback. To provide it, please fill in the Prism survey to share your opinion. If you have tried or used the Composite Application Guidance for either WPF or Silverlight, go take the survey now. The survey has less than 20 questions and should take less than 10 minutes to fill out.

The information from the survey will be used to improve the guidance for the next release of Prism. If you have ideas of what could be needed for the next version, leave a comment in Blaine Wastellâ€™s blog (p&p client product manager) or send an e-mail directly to him. If you have stories of using Prism in your project, and the pros and cons feel free to send them there also.

You can also provide tell us your story/ideas in this thread.

So go take the survey now and tell everyone you know about the survey so we get the feedback.

Thanks in advanced for your feedback
